item.description:
The story of Jamal Malik (Patel), an 18 year-old orphan from the slums of Mumbai, who is about to experience the biggest day of his life. With the whole nation watching, he is just one question away from winning a staggering 20 million rupees on India's "Who Wants To Be A Millionaire?" But when the show breaks for the night, police arrest him on suspicion of cheating; how could a street kid know so much?

I won't give away more of the plot, but the movie has gotten rave reviews, many from members of our group.

After we'll go somewhere for dinner and conversation.
item.how_to_find_us: After the movie, I'll be in at the front of the theater, holding a Meetup sign.
item.name: Slumdog Millionaire
